name: Tavern Brawl (alexchapman)
description:
Tavern Brawl is a rudimentary text adventure game in which you play as a working-class person just trying to cool off after a long day of work!

Will you go to a tavern? Will you get dragged into a brawl? Will you start a brawl? Tavern Brawl answers all these questions and more!

Tavern Brawl was designed to be short and sweet, and was written for a Game Writing university course. Enjoy!
